name: pnp-list-formatting-default-hover-card
title: Default Hover Card
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates showing a default hover card in a document library. On hover in a formatted view on a file a file card is displayed. On hover in a formatted view on a person column a profile card is displayed.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates showing a default hover card in a document library. On hover in a formatted view on a file a file card is displayed. On hover in a formatted view on a person column a profile card is displayed.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
